column2: I have been loyal to my patron for some time. Perhaps it is time to find a new spiritual guide.
column3: Je suis resté loyal à mon protecteur pendant longtemps. Il est peut-être temps d'en changer.

column2: Times change and so do people.
column3: Les temps changent, et les gens aussi.

column2: No, my faith has served me well.
column3: Non, ma foi m'a bien servi.
